March 2019 sierra-green.com Product Design and Development

Sierra Green mobile app

Sierra Green is an app dedicated to support small businesses, by connecting local businesses with new customers and the communities they serve.

Timeframe

Dec 2018- Mar 2019
4 Months

Tools

Pen and Paper, Figma, Sketch App,
Adobe Creative Suite, Invision, React Native, AWS

Role

Strategy,
Design and Development

Team

leadStarship R&D, Design

Idea

Sierra Green has created a platform for users to receive deep discount products to regional small businesses through geofencing. By creating this incentive, the goal is to create lasting relationships between small businesses and their community. Live in Sacramento CA

Simply put, amazing. Savinda does great work, has an eye for detail, incorporates feedback in a very effective manner. I hope to work with him again in the future.
- Ryan Huffman (Founder - Sierra Green)

Mind Map

The premise it to work with business owners, and have them agree to honor deep discounts. Place coupons throughout the city for projects-parallax to identify, and collect by walking through their geolocation. Then once the coupon has been collected, they redeem it back at the place of business specified.

Mind map

Design process

If clean and maintainable code is at the heart of a great product, an intuitive and seamless user experience and user interface (UX / UI) is the soul. In order to have great UX, technical considerations must go into design. In order to express great UI, development teams must give as much attention to their front-end code as they do to their system architecting.

Design process

Research

We conducted a multi-methodology research effort to better understand how projects-parallax interact with map based discount apps, how they wish to use them, their previous experience & current use of technology, & how academic researchers have sought to explore these questions in their relative fields of study.

Competitor Analysis
Research Literature
SEM Data and Trends
Online Questionnaire

Paper prototypes and Wireframes

Wireframe is the plan that guide along the way and keep our workflow organized.

Sign in process
Map view
Scan QR code
Account

Low fidelty prototypes

We don't miss anything in the process.



Final design and product

iOS/ Android and webapp
